Reviews.Title: “Grand Liza Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: bllhd
Reviews.Content: Do not go to this hotel. The rooms are tiny and grubby. I had to reattach the toilet seat. Some of the lights were not working. The shower curtain did not keep water in as it stopped 4 inches from the tray. The wash basin was not fixed. When we returned after sightseeing the room had not been cleaned. We then checked out.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast and size of room”
Reviews.Author: brenda s
Reviews.Content: Booked on line and asked for twin room but only double room available - that was OK. The actual room was so small you couldn't even swing a cat in it. Husband had to sit back on bed if I wanted to pass. Bathroom smelt of sewarage. Recemented our ceiling whilst we were staying and no shower curtain. In the hotel leaflet/city map, our room was advertised as a Single room and a double (with twin beds) was called a double. Confused!!! Charged for a double room. Breakfast was boring - powdered orange juice and instant coffee and coffee mate - disappointing. Lost all enthusiasm to eat. No variation in food either. The air conditioning case was above our heads over the bed so it was very draughty. Duvet on - too hot, duvet off too cold because of A/C. I will mention that the actual bed and pillows were very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel has bad attitude”
Reviews.Author: malcolm16
Reviews.Content: The room is just big enough for 2 and a bag. The roof restaurant super the brekkie is usual. Lift carries two person and bag. Value OK but it has bad attitude. Toilet ran for 3 days and we had no linen on one bed.

Reviews.Title: “To go on a trip with friends”
Reviews.Author: Rititi
Reviews.Content: Ok, so first of all, let's talk about its location! 10 minutos walking distance from the metro station, in the evening the street can be a "little frightening" nevertheless I've never felt afraid of anything...! About the room, the room they gave us (we were 3), lets just say: we had two choices: us or the bags! The room was little and not "beautiful" but for the purpose and price it was not that bad. The most negative thing for me was the breakfast, it is located at the top of the building (thumbs up for this) but the quality is very poor... and the service even worse!

Reviews.Title: “bad customer service”
Reviews.Author: TTravellerrr
Reviews.Content: I emailed Hotel LIza twice about some local tours and supply of amenities and what I got return is being asked for the reservation form impolitely and saying I am "nonsense" and "bXXXshit" .... what sort of customer service are they providing? ___________________________________________________________________ "Dear customer I asked you 3 tÄ±mes . do you want to make rezervtion or do you have rezervation to the our hotel What answered to me. nothing Ä°f you want to explane good Ä±nformation I asked you bout your rezervation You are askÄ±ng shower gel shapoo.You are talkÄ±ng nonsenseam .Ballshit "

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, good value”
Reviews.Author: Christina T
Reviews.Content: Bearing in mind we were staying in Istanbul in August, we thought this hotel was good value at 55 euros for a triple room with breakfast. The location in Kumpkapi is good as it's off the main tourist drag in Sultanahmet and near some good fish restaurants. The bedrooms are small, but we were only there to sleep so not a problem. The bathroom was small but clean and serviceable, good shower. Breakfast on the roof terrace was lovely, though air conditioning unit completely inadequate so advise going up for breakfast before it gets hot outside if visiting in summer. Lovely views from breakfast terrace. Breakfast was ok, average Turkish breakfast, though eggs were always hardboiled and black so we avoided. Staff was OK but not particularly friendly. Would return if there was a particularly good room rate.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: FlorinM
Reviews.Content: Located very close to nearly all major attractions, grand liza hotel is a good choice for money payed. The only thing that bugged me was the breakfast which is the same every day, and not all variate, but then 8 learned that it's a traditional dish.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and friendly, but a little cramped”
Reviews.Author: Swagfella
Reviews.Content: Good location, a 10 minute stroll up the hill to the grand bazaar. Rooftop breakfast, and a separate bar and lounge area. The hotel itself is a bit ramshackle, but that's Istanbul, and sort of adds to its charm. Serviceable, comfortable rooms, but three is a crowd in the annoying single lift that services the hotel. Quite good for mid market tourists, but not so suitable for business travelers.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money! Turkish standard”
Reviews.Author: Malanese
Reviews.Content: Good location in Kumkapi district.Hotel looking like a bit old and dirty but inside and in the rooms all is Ok.On reception many people smoking cigarets. Liza has restaurant on last level, but I not recomend this place. It's expensive place with poor standart. My opinion:Stay in Liza, but not eat in hotel restaurant, Few meters from Hotel You can find small restaurant with delicious lamb meat balls.Prices are really cheap. Hotel Liza are good value for money. Maby view from window is not so nice ,but for this price i recomend for budget travelers,

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for the price”
Reviews.Author: MooseGoat
Reviews.Content: It is very small, the bathrooms are particularly tiny and one very small closet. Breakfast is not a large spread but very fresh bread and great olives, the view is lovely too. You can hear everything in your room, if this is going to bother you, i would suggest that you pick an alternative; we were not too bothered as our main aim was to spend time in the city, not the hotel room. Service was not fantastic but generally pleasant. The hotel is clean. it is not 'very' close to a tram stop, its about a 12 minute walk, uphill but manageble. As a budget hotel it is recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel”
Reviews.Author: Marina A
Reviews.Content: The worst hotel I ever stayed in! I'm wondering how someone could like it? Very unfriendly personnel, rooms are small and dirty, no shower cab, no bath, small TV, very small bed. I never ever would advice anyone to stay there. I checked out same day. Which hotel really impressed me is "History hotel" located in the centre of shopping area Laleli, only two tram stops from Blue Mosque and very close to all other sightseeings. Very clean and modern styled hotel, with LCD TV in room, clean shower cab, and very friendly personnel. Sheets and towels are changed every day. And all this is only 10 euros more (for double) than Grand Liza hotel, but the difference is big.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Rooms BUT all night noise.”
Reviews.Author: Silvergold21
Reviews.Content: The Grand Liza has very nice rooms for the money and the staff is more than friendly. HOWEVER, if getting a proper sleep is a priority, don't go here. The walls between the rooms are paper thin and there is always a tv blaring throughout the night or sudden bangs that jar one out of a deep sleep. Breakfast is adequate.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Liza Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Tiyatro Caddesi 114, 34126 | KumkapÄ±, Istanbul, Turkey
